department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Opaque watercolor on paper; a Lakshmi icon appears at the center and is worshipped by a nobleman holding a cane with a ram's head finial and a Brahmin holding a bell; their two attendants appear in smaller scale beneath them on either side of a Shiva Linga; various offerings are placed on the floor with a white bull at bottom center; borders of white, gray, yellow and light green
marks:
Inscription

At bottom, left of center [R1355/3]
medium: Gouache, ink and gold on paper
title: A Nobleman and Priest with Attendants Worshipping a Lakshmi Icon
